Meet our team

Jan Voss
P.Eng, PTOE
President & Senior Consultant
Jan Voss brings his expertise in traffic engineering operations as both founder and current president of Creative Transportation Solutions Ltd. (CTS). He is a registered Professional Engineer (P.Eng.) and Professional Traffic Operations Engineer (PTOE) in British Columbia, Alberta and the Northwest Territories / Nunavut, and has over 26 years of experience in the field of traffic engineering and operations.
View profile Email

Gary Vlieg
M.Sc., P.Eng
Engineering Group Manager
Gary Vlieg brings his expertise in traffic engineering operations and transportation planning to the CTS Team. He is a registered Professional Engineer (P.Eng.) in British Columbia, Alberta, Nunavut and the Northwest Territories. Gary has over 25 years of experience in transportation planning, traffic engineering and project management throughout Western Canada and New Zealand.
View profile Email

Brent Dozzi
P.Eng
Senior Traffic Engineer
Brent is a dedicated and results driven Professional Engineer with over 35 years of experience in transportation planning and infrastructure design; traffic engineering, operations and safety; and project management.
View profile Email

Aaron Chan
P.Eng
Senior Traffic Engineer
Aaron Chan is currently a senior traffic engineer with CTS and registered as Professional Engineering (P.Eng.) in British Columbia. In his fifteen years career, he has accumulated significant experience in transportation planning, traffic engineering and project management.
View profile Email

Robert Cheung
P.Eng
Senior Traffic Engineer
Robert has been working CTS since 2004 and is a graduate of the University of British Columbia, receiving his Bachelor of Applied Science in 2001. He has international experience working in Hong Kong as an assistant civil engineer. Robert is an expert a signalized and unsignalized intersection analyses including roundabouts.
View profile Email

Denise Parker
Office Manager
Denise joined CTS in April of 2009 as the new Payroll Clerk. Denise comes to CTS with previous Human Resources experience and an Administrative background. In January of 2011 she took on the new role as the Office Manager and now manages; Payroll, Accounts Receivables, Accounts Payables, Administration and all aspects of Human Resources.
View profile Email

Blaine Ogren
Data Group Manager
Blaine is currently the Data Group Manager and has been working with CTS collecting transportation data for over 18 years. Before becoming the Data Group Manager, Blaine was the Assistant Manager of Field Operations at CTS, as well as active field crew. To date, she has conducted over 900 various transportation surveys.
View profile Email

Dominique Guevarra
B.A.Sc., E.I.T.
Junior Traffic Engineer
Dominique is an Engineer-In-Training working as a junior traffic engineer with CTS. He started working with the company in 2013 and is a graduate of the University of British Columbia. His main experiences in traffic include collecting and analyzing data. He is involved in the local engineering community, currently acting as an executive member for the Canadian Society for Civil Engineering Vancouver Section.
View profile Email

Jacqueline Lee
B.A.Sc., E.I.T.
Junior Traffic Engineer
Jacqueline is a Junior Traffic Engineer at CTS and a graduate of the University of British Columbia. She has experience working with a multi-disciplinary and international team of architects and engineers while interning as a junior civil engineer on a project in Ecuador. Her main experiences at CTS include conducting traffic impact and engineering studies, AutoTurn analyses, and analyzing traffic data.
View profile Email

Jael Lumba
B.A.Sc., E.I.T.
Junior Traffic Engineer
Jael is an Engineer-In-Training working as a junior traffic engineer with CTS. Her alma mater is the University of British Columbia where she graduated from integrated engineering, majoring in civil and minoring in mechanical engineering. Jael’s work experience with CTS primarily involves conducting traffic impact and engineering studies, data processing and analysis. She’s also a current member of Young Professionals in Transportation (YPT).
View profile Email

Darshan Soni
B.A.Sc., E.I.T.
Junior Traffic Engineer
Darshan is an Engineer-In-Training working as a junior traffic engineer with CTS. His alma mater is the University of British Columbia where he graduated from Integrated Engineering, majoring in civil engineering and minoring in materials engineering. Darshan’s work experience with CTS primarily involves traffic surveying, equipment maintenance, data processing and analysis. He is also a current member of the Engineers & Geoscientists BC as well as Young Professionals in Transportation (YPT).
